comments.body:
Created attachment 13676
patch to fix comment bug in numguess.jsp
Can someone with jakarta-servletapi-5 karma please commit this simple fix?  ;)
Updating serverity as per discussion on tomcat-dev

description:
The /webapps/jsp-examples/num/numguess.jsp starts with double HTML comment start
tag.
summary: SERVLETAPI: Wrong html comment in numguess.jsp
